contextId.information: Here "themselves" is used to emphasize those people who had heard about the Thessalonian believers. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_rpronouns]])
The words "you" and "yourselves" refer to the Thessalonian believers. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_rpronouns]])
Here "himself" refers back to "Father" for emphasis. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_rpronouns]])
